messages.body: It's a fine morning.
You head for the door, ready to go outside.
You're going out today too? Where to?
messages.speaker: Mom

messages.body: Kill some monsters, mom.
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: Why do I even ask, she does this every day...
messages.speaker: Mom

messages.body: Your rumbling stomach made you decide to go back home.
I'm back
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: Good, it's time for dinner.
messages.speaker: Mom

messages.body: Hey mom...
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: What is wrong, dear?
messages.speaker: Mom

messages.body: I'm leaving town
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: Hahahahaa, oh You...
messages.speaker: Mom

messages.body: And I'm Mboi, God of Waterways!
messages.speaker: Mom

messages.body: C'mon, eat up.
messages.speaker: Mom

messages.body: You go back to bed, unsatisfied with what your mom said.
You stop moving and take a deep breath.
You stare at your hands, which are stronger than ever.
Yet, something concerns you.
I feel like it becomes harder and harder to become stronger...
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: A shady man approaches you.
Hey kid.
messages.speaker: Man

messages.body: Who are you?
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: Name's Cid.
messages.speaker: Man

messages.body: I feel like I've seen that name before...
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: You wanna become stronger? Heh. Sometimes you gotta lose it all to reach a new height.
messages.speaker: Cid

messages.body: Anyways, take this. It teaches you how to Soul Crush.
messages.speaker: Cid

messages.body: He hands you an old scroll.
I shouldn't really take things from strangers...
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: But oh well. I'll take a shot. Hope it doesn't get me killed.
messages.speaker: You

messages.body: You may not be able to do it now, but someday... Good luck, kid.
messages.speaker: Cid

messages.body: Soul Crush is now accessible. You need to be at a certain level to use it.
